author: SmokingOnTheBombHay
body:
Bro I had to listen to tea party radio.

Here was Glen Beck “Obama bad, stock, Obama bad big bad, economy bad, Wall Street big mean, *fake crying , me patriot, now let’s hear from our sponser”. “Let me tel you how to have your portfolio ready for upcoming market turbulence, buy silver”

So many boomers in that warehouse bought it up though.  I pretty much told that, but god they were dumb.

author: DeveloperJ
body:
Lol. They haven’t payed the 10 million shares they owe due to ITM calls on Friday. They have till tomorrow. 

The volume is low. It’s a short ladder attack. These are counterfeit shares. It doesn’t actually impact the stock price. It’ll go back up. The stock is shorted over 100%.

 Neither the ITM calls from Friday nor the shorted stocks have even started to cover. Selling during a ladder attack is what they want. The only way GME actually goes down is from idiots selling during an artificial stock drop. 

Do whatever you want. I’m pretty sure it’s illegal for people to tel you what to do. But if you’re asking for reasons why I am holding, there they are.
